title: Barbara Davis Center Adult Clinic Translational Research Endowment Fund
description: To provide support for faculty salary, research, program, and educational activities about translational research in the Young Adult Clinic at the Barbara Davis Center at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide support for faculty salary, research, program, and educational activities about translational research in the Young Adult Clinic at the Barbara Davis Center at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
